QuestData.Title: War on the Ramparts
QuestData.Description: Watchkeeper Gargolmar and Vazruden the Herald are in charge of defending these ramparts.$B$BIf you take them out, their forces will be in complete disarray.$B$BSlay them both and bring me proof so the invasion can begin!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Watchkeeper Gargolmar, Vazruden the Herald and Vazruden's drake, Nazan. Return Gargolmar's Hand and Nazan's Head to Stone Guard Stok'ton.
QuestData.CompletionText: This operation depends on your success, $N.
QuestData.RewardText: With their leadership dead their forces should be in disarray.$B$BBut there's far more to this than killing a few guards, $c.
